item.description:
Ewww... No plans Saturday morning! That means that there shall be biking!

Join me this Saturday at 9 AM on a trip from Barrington on the East Bay Bikepath.

The entire path is roughly 26 miles round trip, but since we're starting from the middle, riders can simply do half the ride. I'm hoping to go a bit faster than usual this weekend. We usually average 11 mph over the entire trip. I'd like to push it up to 13 or so.

We'll meet ON THE BIKE PATH in front of Shaws, right next to the white wooden signboards.

I'm going to be wearing my stylish bike helmet, and I suggest (but do not require) that you do the same.

Any one who wants can sign up for Newport Polo later in the day
item.how_to_find_us: I have a red bike, also I have a cell: 401-699-7304
item.name: Biking East Bay on Sat (medium pace)
